metadata.title: Disable X11 forwarding
metadata.description: SSH supports the forwarding of X11 sessions. This enables graphical applications, running on a remote host, to be displayed on the host you are connecting from. Unless explicitely required, this feature must be disabled by default.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

criterion.comment: file /etc/ssh/sshd_config may not have a line that matches ^X11Forwarding.*yes

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: File /etc/ssh/sshd_config may not have a line that matches ^X11Forwarding.*yes
